com.lpoo.game.model.entities

Class BallModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lpoo.game.model.entities.EntityModel
      • com.lpoo.game.model.entities.BallModel

  • public class BallModel
extends EntityModel
    A model representing a single ball.

      • BallModel

        Ball Model's Constructor. Creates a ball in a given starting position, in a given world.
        Parameters:
        world - Physics world where the ball will be used in.
        pos - Ball's initial Position.

        Parameters:

      • jump

        public void jump()
        Logic associated to the Ball. Controls the Ball's current state, making it jump if on the ground, making it dunk if flying.

      • setState
